subject: Penis vs. wet pussies
body:
You need to buy lots of meds, but you don't want to pay huge sums of money? 
Order now!
Absolutely legal, licensed and CHEAP pills at your choice. Confidential purchase. Instant shipping
Order now!
Switch on your penis!
With best regards,
Barbara Kramer
 
 
Nekotoroe vremia my stoiali molcha, razdelennye stolom, i sverkali drug na Druga glazami, slovno zlejshie vragi. . Sheltiane ne uspevali pricelitsia, i zariady vzryvalis za Korotyshkoj, ne prichiniaia emu vreda, vydirali kuski sten i mostovoj. Hodu! I ne oborachivajsia! Posle tretego kopia i eshche dvuh podozhzhennyh stroenij po telu razlilas Nesterpimaia bol. 
Shest vytianulsia, kak zmeinoe zhalo, celias v grud, no ia otskochil. Nikakoj ugrozy ot etogo sushchestva Ne ishodilo, namereniia u nego byli samye mirnye, hvatatsia za oruzhie ia ne Stal. I eto prokliatoe videnie, tak neozhidanno vpletennoe v tkan sna Zakliuchitelnym akkordom. Mne ne hvatalo ego umeniia, no ia vozmeshchal ego Skorostiu reakcii, dostatochnoj, chtoby vyderzhivat ego beshenyj temp. Kvin vdrug obnaruzhil, chto sleduiushchim predstoit idti emu. O nebo! Takoj boli ia ne Ispytyval nikogda v zhizni. Iz vseh liudskih ras, naseliaiushchih zemli Vnutrennego Kruga, net nikogo s takimi temnymi volosami. Net, nichego osobennogo. 
Ia poshliu sluzhanku. Vmesto nee strashnaia Bezdonnaia iama. Rovnye riady raznoobraznyh ekzoticheskih rastenij s Drugih planet tianulis vdol shchedro prisypannyh zolotistym peskom peshehodnyh Dorozhek, prednaznachennyh, vne vsiakogo somneniia, iskliuchitelno dlia nog shefira I ego blizhajshego okruzheniia. Ego zovut Ostin Valigas, i on imenno tot, kogo ty ishchesh. ejisuminyon Q1FUW1pVckRcUFBGHUFCUEZWRlleXR1XVA==
